name: Rover In A Hole: The Quest for the ULTRA STONE
name_original: Rover In A Hole: The Quest for the ULTRA STONE
description:
Send your Rover out to mine the riches of these Alien Depths

Use your l00t to fund tougher and faster equipment!

Dig to the core on your mission to find the exquisite ULTRA STONE.

Rate us (and the other fine games) on the Ludum Dare page!
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/rover-in-a-hole-the-quest-for-the-ultra-s...

S/A/D - Dig Down/Left/Right

R - Teleport to surface and sell cargo
